name: To the POint ALPHA v0.1
description:
This Is a ALPHA version, so there may be bugs and things that won't be in the final version. Please give feedback! There also isn't much to do yet, but there will be in v0.2.

Play as a young hero with a gun fighting many monsters in a vast kingdom to stop the slime revolution from taking over the nation! FIght in the maze-havened forests, sandy Beaches, Vast, battlefield ruined Fields, The Sea, or even in a volcano! 

Explore Temples in the process housing the masterminds of the slime rebellion: the Slime Lords! battle exploding apples, sporing fungus, and even slime-controlled gooping monsters(that were actually our friends!)!

Be in the capital a city, a town, or even just your own home! Talk to many beings, including a helpful tree! 

The full version of To the POint is coming to you in early 2020, so play it for free on the web, or download it for free on Windows and Mac! A great adventure is coming to you!
